name: Patrick Patterson
text: First time being here. It's cheap, it taste good and it's an all you can eat buffet. Is there anything else you need to know. The all you can eat is all day everyday and it's like $8.50 with a drink. You can't beat that. The pizza taste much better here than that other all you can eat pizza place.

name: Shilpah Mathew
text: First timer here. The buffet is affordable, the server gives you an option to request for pizzas with any topping that you'd like and they make them fresh for you. The fresh pizzas are really good but the ones on the buffet line tend to get …More

name: Oz Maya
text: Good experience. Friendly staff. Good pizza Buffett. Can ask for more. Buffett is $6.99

name: Sean Parker
text: If you are a fan of the Mr. Gattis you grew up with (80's) then a visit is required here. It is good!!! Do note it is not a buffet.

name: Izzy Wonder
text: They're buffet options are great! You're able to ask for a personal pizza the the rest of the guests can enjoy. The manager and his staff are very polite and attentive. The atmosphere is very nice and welcoming! Great game selection too. Will return with the family!!!

name: slime Athon
text: We love going to the Richardson location! Everybody is so nice! They talk and play with my kids oh, they are always smiling common babies eat for free! It's clean and they have a better variety of food than CiCi's. Like they have macaroni …More

name: Gordon Chow
text: Was sorely disappointed with the quality of the food. Pizza has been sitting there for quite sometime and the crust are really dry. It is rather dangerous to serve food like this because of how sharp and dry it is! I tried the spaghetti …More

name: Sean Hamidi
text: I have eaten here several times and enjoyed it. There is plenty of food with a lot of variety. Maurice, the general manager, is extremely friendly and attentive. All you can eat at a great price provides exceptional value.

name: Jacqulyn Sims
text: Came in here for the first time on a Saturday night. There were two other groups at the restaurant when we arrived. (We should have been deterred by how few of people there were). The pizza on the buffet had been left out for a while and …More

name: Teresa Pimpsorn
text: Friendly and caring service. 70's music loud enough that people at other tables don't hear your conversation. Not loud enough to hurt your ears. Game room and private dining for small or medium groups. Great pizza menu or create your own pizza.

name: Chair
text: Good but, don’t eat here at lunch or dinner. When it gets crowded there seems to be a lack of employees and pizza being produced, when pizza is produced however, the pizza is generally good and tasty. Nice employees and clean place except …More

name: Ava Coull
text: I came here with my advanced art class for a felid trip ( we stopped here to get lunch) i loved the pizzas and all the deserts! the staff was exceedingly nice and came to check on us every hour. The manager on staff was so funny and made …More

name: Jason B.
text: Wouldn’t waste my money here. Barely any pizza on the buffet, and what was there sucked. It looked like it was straight outta the microwave. Will never come back. I can get a better experience from Tony’s Pizza coming out of my oven. It …More

name: Andy Stengel
text: The pizza was well made and the staff was friendly and cared about people with food allergies. The place has a game room for kids and several TVs for parties and the bathroom was well kept. 5 out of 5 stars a must see pizza place.

name: Kathryn Wisdom
text: I had a little issue with the cashier, but the manager James took care of everything.   He has good customer service. 😊  Good salad bar always fresh.  Great deal for senior citizens and awesome brownies!

name: Bradley Gloriani
text: My wife grew up loving Mr. Gatti's pizza.  After most of them closed in the North Dallas area, we were pleased to see this location open.  The first time we went here, they had just opened up, and you could tell they were still getting …More

name: Justin Hillard
text: Worst pizza I’ve ever had, it is not worth any money or time. Cardboard tastes better than this. Pizza rolls are fine dining compared to this nasty place. It was my first and last time. I recommend not eating here EVER. I’m surprised health …More

name: HE KEPT Me
text: Absolutely delicious. First timers.  I am a vegetarian and although they were about to close they went out of the way to accommodate my finicky eating habits.  Great staff , friendly,  accommodating,  delicious . No more cicis for me THANKS GUYS 💙

name: Chris Libby
text: Just got back from there. Staff is great - they take care of the wife and me.  I don't eat the crust, so they make a crust-less pizza for me. …More

name: Free MyMind
text: This place was clean and fun a year ago. They have ran the whole thing into the ground so bad I can't wait to see what replaces it after they close the doors. I WILL NOT be back. You can fix what I witnessed happen here. I can't go into …More

name: Wendy Jones
text: Rude manager- pizza never cooked enough!! Very sad could be such a nice place. Also on the website it says it closes at 9 but I tried to place an order one evening for pick up at 8:30 and was told to bad it’s to late!! Just plain rude.

name: Gabriel Medina
text: I've tried many many pizzas around the DFW area, and this is one of the best! The pizza is amazing! It is a great place to take your kids since they have a game room. They have great customer service. My personal favorite is the three meat pizza. The Supreme is also very good.

name: Kyle H
text: Great deal on price. Used to eat here a lot as a kid when it was located at Belt Line and Jupiter. Haven't had it in over 15 years. Flavors are good but would be better if they cooked out the tomato paste flavors more. Sauce is too heavy on …More

name: Roger PetroRoy
text: I recently received one of Mr. Gatti's coupons with an offer too good to pass up.  Not only are their pizzas excellent but when picking up our order, I was given an extra pizza because the staff was not happy with the way one of the pizzas …More

name: Jason Lane
text: Me and my girlfriend just ate here for the first time, and both thought the pizza was great. The salad was good & the sides were great. The macaroni and cheese, the corn and The green beans are well above average. We had The coconut créme …More

name: Robert Price
text: Nice location, pizza tasted great, good selection of drinks and I enjoyed the music, my family will be making this a new favorite place to eat at.

name: Jay Vinson
text: Had better. Came in 11am. Not enough selections. Took 20 minutes. Would not recommend. Not like old store.

name: The Edge
text: Today pizza was hot & fresh & it kept coming without long wait times. Much, much better than previous times. Everyone in the restaurant seemed satisfied today. Good job Gatti. This place is no longer in business.

name: SA B
text: Great service delicious pizza

name: Kam Noor
text: Went to Gatti’s for the lunch buffet. Food was great and they were happy to make any pizzas asked for. Played in the arcade and had a good time. Will be going again!

name: Maria Sanchez
text: Best pizza I have ever tastes definitely coming here again. Great place for a family to eat. Tons of fun games for the kids! I love the food and the spaghetti here is amazing I would definitely recommend it for family meals!! And I'm picky so says alot!!😊😊

name: SoulFlower_IndieGoddess
text:
Pizza tonight was fresh, service was nice and the food and staff were attentive. Great experience with good deals.
I would consider going back again definitely!
Thanks!

name: Christian Carter
text: Was here for lunch today! The service was awful!  They did not keep the pies coming out in time for people to enjoy their lunch. Long line for basically 1 pie for 8 people, if you percentage it down. Now that the lunch rush isover. There is …More

name: Tina Morales
text:
I gave one star cause the pudding was good and I love the ice from their fountain machines.
Other than that.... the pizza was gross, the spaghetti noodles were way …More

name: Tania Anderson
text: The bruschetta doesn't come with cheese,the mgr( James?) Asked if there was anything he could do,asked why it didn't come with cheese and he apologized,brought us out some details cheese and more garlic bread to enjoy it more. That made …More

name: Patricia Morris
text: The pizza was horrible. The pepperoni on top was not cooked so I lifted the toppings to look at the crust. The crust was completely raw. I asked to see a mamnager and she said that that was the cooks 1st day. The pizza should have never …More

name: Don Lee
text:
It's good, just not use to the brick oven pizza from Mr. Gattis. I'm from Austin the home of Mr
Gattis and it taste better to me when cook the old way. But the brick over is good also.

name: Jamie Pena
text: Mr Gatti's has always been my favorite pizza. Lived in Austin for many years. Main pizza there. My boyfriend and I live in Carrollton so this location is a little ways. The first time we went manager James was working and everything was …More

name: Adrienne Johnson
text: Literally infested with roaches. My friend got a video of them crawling all over the service counter. They made manager, Maurice aware of the issue and his response was to 'just step on them." …More

name: Annette Quinn
text: Good variety of pizza and they will make one to order for you. They need to find a better way to keep the spinach fresh.

name: Daniel P
text: Good pizza,  I always order my own and they make it for me fast.

name: Maria Valenciano
text: Y'all need to check your food once you start eating i found hair in my soup and my salad.  It was pretty disappointing because the food looks great but im warning y'all plz check your food before you start eating.

name: JOSE ANAYA
text: I love this place and the food BUT they need to learn to check on the food every 5-10 minutes. Pizza was old and dry, Salad bar was empty, Dressings were out and no lids for the cups. The restaurant is empty I don’t see why they don’t have anything stalked up.

name: Natalie Hankins
text: Been here about 10x and everytime, Pizza is never ready. Get there and have to wait on pizza like everyone else. Great pizza they just don’t ever make enough.

name: Antonio Vasquez
text: Courteous, Clean, Outstanding staff. Came in after lunch, made fresh pizza. Very accomidating.

name: Crystal Carpenter
text: Nice atmosphere, very clean, and friendly the buffet clean and fresh yes Kid friendly also!! Good music variety.. Thank you Richardson Mr Gattis! God bless

name: Janie Jackson
text: If I could give half a star or none then I would pick that.. We got there around 7:45 pm and paid almost $45 for my family of 5 and there wasn't any pizza ready but 1 pepperoni and jalapeno, BUT the jalapenos we dried up. The salad bar was …More

name: Pam Haith
text: Great place! Clean, friendly, excellent food. Great to see they are using the same great spaghetti sauce recipe. Best gatties pizza I have ever been to. Staff is acommadating and eager to please. Definitely be back.

name: Karen Rivers
text: Ordered fettucine pasta. Took half an hour to get my food, while other members of my party were already on their second slice of pizza--and they didn't get my order right! They should learn to manage time better and listen carefully to when I order!

name: Carly Tyler
text: Great staff!! The food was awesome too. They make any pizza you ask for!

name: Debbie Aguirre
text: They changed their Pizza Crust recipe and it tastes different and cheap. The salad was fresh.

name: Amy San Miguel
text: this place is hit and miss depending on the manager in duty..... you must not be afraid to request new pizzas for the buffet..... pizza is always good thou

name: cheesyhead4765 johnwall
text: Just seen a video being shared of this location on FB that shows Roaching crawling everywhere all around the food. Do not eat here. For the employee to say that all the manager said when it was addressed was to step on them?? Really? …More

name: Gerry Holt
text: Definitely my favorite pizza buffet restaurant. They'll awayal make a request pizza and the saids on the pizza is one of my favorites of any pizza place. This is the place I always think of when I want really good, cheap pizza

name: David Jones
text: Very pleasant atmosphere. Pizza was fresh and hot.

name: AshleyRenay Williams
text: Never been here Thank God. Its a viral video on Facebook. This place is INFESTED WITH ROACHES. NEVER SEEN ANYTHING SO DISGUSTING IN MY LIFE. PLEASE DO NOT EAT HERE IF YOU VALUE YOUR HEALTH!!!!!

text: Better than cicis pizza and pizza in good service , friendly people, clean atmosphere

name: Savannah Ducre
text: Ordered to go for the first time, today (10.28.18). The pizza was cold, found a hair, and some sort of paper underneath the slice. I am absolutely disgusted. I will not return.

name: Ben Burr
text: Terrible pizza, more expensive than Cici's, and poor selection. The Holy Trinity of pizza failure. …More

name: Joseph Young
text: This place is no longer a good pizza Buffet. When we walked in there were maybe 4 pizzas on the line and non of them were the popular ones that everyone eats. All the pizza looked old and just not appealing. And the music that were playing …More

name: Missy Bautista
text: Food was great wish there was more variety

name: Jeffrey M
text: The pizza buffet was really lacking; only 3 pizzas out; tea tasted old; salad produce had freezer burn; only thick crust pizza available. This location and Mesquite have bad buffets.

name: Chris Vitek
text: The delivery guys showed up without the salad.  He told me that his manager told him to offer a discount.  So, the manager sent the delivery guy anyway.  That's what they think of their customers.

name: A Lewis
text: Was so excited when this place opened.  The atmosphere is nice, but the recipe is NOT the same.  The fireplace cooking ruins the crust.  The bottom is burned and makes dough chewy.  So disappointed.  I want to order again and ask if they have a regular oven option for cooking.  Right now, their cooking procedure is unsuccessful.

name: Agnes Parentis
text: Inexpensive place to go for a  buffet.  Pizza is continuously being made.  Staff greets you when you come in and asks if there is anything you need

name: Richard San Miguel
text: When we first found this location we were so happy. First visit was not the best but it was okay enough to come back. Second visit was  a lot better . So we decide to go again tonight.... boy was this an eye opener. 4 old pizza on the line …More

name: Justin Hess
text: Took the guy 5min to acknowledge my existence and after paying for the buffet I go down and there was no pizza. Took another 10-15min for any pizza to come out and when they did it was not well cooked and the selection was terrible.

name: Angela Boswell
text: Please have an adult at night in management. I came around 5:30 place was a mess. All the teenagers moving at slow speed. One pizza pie with only two pieces. No spaghetti, no spaghetti sauce, salad bar an empty mess,no desert, no bread …More

name: Pedro G Martinez
text: The pizza was great and the buffet deal is a great idea if you are bringing your family or friends

name: Jayme Fagan
text: Food was good but did find hair in my food multiple times would come back hopefully I have a better experience.

name: Deiondre Mathis
text: Everything is pretty decent except the desserts. None of them are good.  Salad taste fresh.

name: Jason Solchenberger
text: I haven't had pizza in a while and was really looking forward to good pizza, but this place failed miserably. Understaffed and all the pizza was burned. I will not return.

name: Dean Wallace
text: Not one clean table. Pizza is old and cold. Sad spending hard earned money and people just steal it from you right in your face.

name: Jaclyn Cortez
text: Gatti’s Pizza tastes great and is cheap! I will definitely be coming back!

name: M. O.
text: Best pizza buffet that I know of with a few minor issues I noticed but for what they offer its priced very well.  Much better than CiCi's.  Great quality pizza and it was all fresh and hot.  Pasta was also good and the marinara sauce was …More

name: Dallas Texas
text: Some cold pizza. No parmasea cheese in jars. Only one or two pizzas. Services was good. That's why the 3 stars.

name: Mornasheia Smith
text: First off I would like to say the restaurant was very clean, once my family and I checked in we got our food and as I was eating the salad with the croutons the croutons were kind of getting steal, and they only had one style of marinara …More

name: randi mcconnell
text: I should have heeded the previous warnings. The girl making pizza was doing so without gloves. That means her grubby little fingers are all up in the cheese for those 9 pizzas she's making out on the counter right now. There isnt much to …More

name: Melissa Garcia
text: Went to this place once before and really enjoyed it. The place was clean it was kind of busy but the pizza was fresh and the manager checked and made sure everything was okay and the pizza was good, a little over priced but it was okay. I …More

name: Sherry Murrell
text: We really like the pizza here and the service has always been good. Keep it up

name: Shawn Terry
text: Service was great & pizza delicious.

name: John Rambo
text: Always a great experience.  They will take special requests, and prepare any type of pizza you request, with no questions asked.

name: Sheldon Canady
text: Nice atmosphere and food!

name: Camille H
text: I have been eating Gattis since I was a little girl and they still have that amazing taste. I love this Mr. Gattis

name: jay donihoo
text: Ok enough. There are definitely better options close.

name: Jim Brown
text: A little pricey but their buffet is good.

text: Seems they have a new staff during the lunch period ...they are awsome ....great food and service .......engaging folks , nice experience at a great value .....

name: Debra Aviles
text: Personable, fast pizza for my pick up. Can't wait.

name: Phillip Sones
text: Would give a negative rating if possible.  Pay your money and they have 1 slice of pizza. AT LUNCH TIME!!! Idea make more pizzas right? Nope. 1 small pizza at a time. No salad, Place is the worst place I've ever been to.

name: Rof exa
text: It was OK if you love PORK, this place is for you. Not a lot of chicken or beef options.

name: Quade Jackson
text: Definitely not a lunch place, no sweet tea and 3 puzzas on buffett plus 2-3 more thats been sitting for who knows how long

name: Shayna Chandler
text: Horrible service and food! We had free coupons and I wouldn't go back!

name: Ryan Spradlin
text: The pizza was really greasy and nothing special. The pasta was way overcooked, but they made up for it by using far too much sauce. The place was clean and the staff was friendly, albeit slow. But way too much money for very little satisfaction.

name: rebecca k orr-parks
text: Cons: Tea was not ready upon opening. The employees stared at the tea maker when I made the request. It seems that no one was trained. Once the tea was made, it was not drinkable. I essentially paid for water. …More

name: marilyn coats
text: Very sad rendition of buffet. So dissapointed raised my kids going to the other beltline location sad it deteriorated to scary. But new site was so excited finally raise money to go but son is 21 and said oh god mom thwy need me to manage …More

name: Stephen Dominguez
text: I grew up in the area and am familiar with this chain.  I had some friends who used to work for Mr Gattis back in the 80s and 90s.  This place is completely different from that one.  The pizza recipe is different, but in my opinion it's now …More

name: Kyle Reist
text: The location is new, clean and kid friendly but apparently they've changed their recipe for this specific location and I wasn't impressed and nor were my kids.  We used to eat at their old location on Beltline before it closed a couple of …More

name: Al Madrigal
text: Best pizza in DFW!!!!!

name: Andrew Hilton
text:
I have tried many New Places since moving to Dallas Area.  This is, Hands Down, the best 'Hidden Gem' I have found so far.
A 12 inch Calzone w/your choice of 3 ingredients==$9.00. Plenty for two. …More

text:

The staff at Mr Gatti's has been exceptional in meticulously guarding my food …More

text: Great pizza, pasta and salad. Dessert was delish !!!!

name: valentino caprizzi
text:
I know it’s difficult to find good help  this day and time... but seriously.,
Also I ordered a couple of pizzas to go, they had an extreme amount of cheese..undercooked. Never again.
1/28/18. Very unsanitary.

name: lori mcelroy
text: Mr Gatti's in name only. Come here for pizza but don't expect it to be a Mr Gatti's. Pizza sauce that came with the cheese bread was so watery and thin. We have no interest in going back.
